Topic.Title: I beg of your help: My job is on the line

Posts.EditableText:
I promised my boss a working copy of a project which was 100% made on the demo version of QDK, which is only 8 days old. It was going great until today, when, trying to open my project, it gave me an error message: Run-Time Error '5': Invalid Procedeur Call or Argument. 
I need this project, I can't start it over, I only have 2 or 3 days until it's due, and i'll be fired if I mess this up: It was the only chance he was giving me after another incident where I couldn't get a project done on time. [b:3qxldq7w]For the love of all that is good and holy, What can I do to recover this file?!?!?!?[/b:3qxldq7w]

Sincerely, Designer Jodan
Posts.HTML:
I promised my boss a working copy of a project which was 100% made on the demo version of QDK, which is only 8 days old. It was going great until today, when, trying to open my project, it gave me an error message: Run-Time Error '5': Invalid Procedeur Call or Argument.
I need this project, I can't start it over, I only have 2 or 3 days until it's due, and i'll be fired if I mess this up: It was the only chance he was giving me after another incident where I couldn't get a project done on time. For the love of all that is good and holy, What can I do to recover this file?!?!?!?

Sincerely, Designer Jodan

Posts.EditableText:
you're using QDK as a project, and if you dont make a full working game, you're going to get fired....

ok, first of all, get a new job.  secondly, open the file up in notepad and see if there are any errors in the asl.  you should turn on the log so that you can see what the error is (might help)
